title: Electronic Warfare Resource Planning
description: A planner must select the correct electronic warfare (EW) jamming asset to suppress an enemy's air defense radar during a strike.

tasks.description: Analyze intelligence on the specific type and frequency bands of the enemy radar system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner correctly identifies the technical characteristics of the threat radar.

tasks.description: Query the available EW asset database for platforms capable of jamming the identified frequencies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner identifies two types of aircraft with suitable jamming pods.

tasks.description: Select the standoff jamming aircraft as it can suppress the radar from a safe distance, reducing risk to the strike package.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner makes the optimal choice based on both effectiveness and safety.
